tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted with Dr. Chetan Nagaraj regarding our grandfather's (age 85) hip fracture. Dr. Nagaraj was prompt in his response and provided patient and timely advice regarding the scans and x-rays to be conducted at minimal discomfort to the patient. He explained the concern in detail and the options for treatment. We opted for surgery as it was the best option available and Dr. Nagaraj facilitated admission and conducted the surgery at Sagar Apollo Hospital. Our grandfather is recovering well and is on his way to full fitness and activity as before.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted the doctor for pain in right scapula extending to right hand. I have cardiac history (CABG in 2014). I saw the doctor after finding no relief for more than 3 weeks after online some online consultations.

The doctor was very patient and identified the issue. He explained everything clearly. * *** ********** ***** ** *** ******* ***** ********* *** ****** ** *** *****. I appreciate the doctor for avoiding suggesting unnecessary tests right-away.

I would recommend the doctor without any hesitation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was having problem in my left shoulder from last one year. The pain was so much that I was not able to sleep, unable to move my hand even high power painkiller was not helping. I went to many Doctors but it was not helping then my family doctor suggested me about Dr Chetan in Vikram Hospital. We went to Vikram hospital Chetan sir saw my MRI report and told I am having 2 problem 1st is my muscles is tear and 2nd is shoulder is frozen, so he told 1st he will try with medicine and Physiotherapy  but it did not work then he suggested injection  for frozen shoulder but it also did not help. Then he suggested for surgery. 1st we thought its so big hospital it will be very costly but Chetan sir explain us each and every thing and given us package. We thought they will charge extra amount from given package but at a time of bill I was surprise actually they have collected 30k lesser amount. After surgery now its 11th day my pain has gown almost 90% now I am not taking painkiller tablet. Thanks to Chetan sir and all the staff in Vikram hospital. They were very helpful.
Dr Chetan is a very good person. He is very talented  and knowledgeable person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Chethan performed a total knee replacement on my father who is 67 years old. We are extremely happy with the entire process , starting from the initial consultation, the surgery and the post-surgery care. The doctor's friendly demeanor, and clear assertive communication are great confidence boosters. He is easily approachable which made the whole process of undergoing a major surgery during the pandemic a lot easier.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Chethan Nagaraj is an amazing Doctor. I have been interacting with him for my mother aged 72 years. Have approached him twice once for a knee replacement and another for a hip resurfacing. Doctor is extremely humble,  friendly and approachable. His diagnosis and treatment has helped my mom to recover quickly. Special thanks for his  attention to cater to individual patient needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Chetan is a down to earth person and treats the patient with lot of care. He handles each and every patient smoothly and takes them into his confidence before actually starting the surgery/treatment.  I am very happy and able to walk and even run like before post tendon surgery.  To be honest, I  never felt the pain when he was putting/ replacing the POP also but when my husband  touched, I felt the pain. All in all he is God for me and I got to walk again because of him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Shoulder SLAP (Tear) Lesions,Shoulder Surgery,Ligament and Tendon Repair,Ligament injuries,Arthroscopy,
review:
*** ******* ****** ** *** **** ****** *** ****** * *** **** ****** *** **** **** he find the issues in a click without any major money loss on tests but he treated the issue with utmost care and the moment i meet him 50% of my stress and worries vanished 
I owe him a lot and wish him good luck and god be with him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Myself n my hubby had met with a car crash with multiple fractures in both the legs for us. I had a femur bone fracture n 6 bones fractures in the left foot..my hubby too had knee patela broken n multiple bones fractured in feet..both of us hv implants in our legs n within no time we were back to our normal life n office..we have toured many places including Rajasthan climbing up forts..all these was possible only because of Dr Chetan Nagraj who treated us.. we are so thankful to him ..he's  not only a fantastic Doctor but a wonderful person too..we will be grateful to him always..

tags: None
review: I have visited doctor for my ankle pain.  It was very worst experience.  It didn't cure properly after following doctor suggestions. Consultation fee was very high and also for every week need to pay consultation fee. Too expensive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: It was nice to meet dr. Chetan , was friendly and made me comfortable.  He made surgery successful and his tips are helpful for the recovery!! I would like to recommend about Dr. Chetan to friends and family.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I consulted the doctor for an ankle injury. I think the explanation of the issue and the confidence that it will get better was really helpful.
I have been visiting the doctor with my aunt for knee surgery consultation and every visit we come back with a lot of support and confidence.
That's the most important part in the journey of recovery.
Have recommended and spoken about the experience to a lot of people in the family and continue to do so.
Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: **** ******  *** Good Humanity DoctorDoctor Treats in a good way ad he will guide the people and convince the people in a good  way  not only like that doctor is a very friendly in nature Definitely I will refer the patients for the doctor Example Me only because I have taken my  uncle recently to the doctor he treated well and now my uncle is good  now by the grace of the doctors and God

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I know Dr. Chethan Sir from last 5-6 Years. He helped for many of Known elders by giving the Treatment and Good advises to many.

Also Even though he is Busy, for my request he is visited to my native place villages(Vaddarahalli, Ramanagara Dist) and he was given the Free Treatment for many our Village needy guys and many valuable points during the camp.

Good me once for those who are having the body Pain, Joint Pains, etc

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hats off to dr Chetan Nagaraj! 
Truly an amazing and friendly doctor.
My sister was here as she had a Very small minor accident which in turn resulted in an heirline fracture. Sir was very kind and explained every bit in detail and helped us with the treatment.
Thanks a lot sir!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr. Chetan performed ACL reconstruction surgery on my right knee 2yrs ago and I have recovered well. He explained the surgery procedure thoroughly and provided confidence in me. He is very professional and an excellent doctor. I recommend my friends and family to get all ortho related treatments through Dr. Chetan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was very friendly and supported in having positive thinking and assured that I could restore all regular activities with my right hand post surgery in 3 months.  Under his guidance and follow up my injury has recovered fully and I am back with normal activities using my right hand.
